Captain.Title: J.T. Esteban
Captain.Ability: The Captain's Discretion [TALENT] Upgrade may be equipped to this Captain. WHEN THIS SHIP WOULD BE DESTROYED: Move up to 2 [CREW] Upgrades equipped to this ship to another friendly ship even if it exceeds that ship's restrictions.

Captain.Title: Klaang
Captain.Ability: WHEN ATTACKING: If the defending ship is an [INDEPENDENT] ship or has an [INDEPENDENT] Captain equipped to it: This ship rolls +1 attack die.

Captain.Title: Duras, Son of Toral
Captain.Ability: ACTIVATION PHASE: After an enemy ship in Range moves: You may change this ship's Maneuver.

Captain.Title: Jhamel
Captain.Ability: This card cannot be affected by anything that affects a Captain, and this card counts as a Roman Drone Pilot. ACTION: Target an opposing ship in this ship's Primary Firing Arc. The target ship rolls -2 attack dice against this ship.
